overview: On the salt lake of Bonneville, thrills of engines are heard in the distance. At the wheel is Icare, a chimpanzee determined to exceed the known speed limits.  In iconic vehicles and ever more powerful, Icare will try to reach the ultimate speed of 400 mph, considered inaccessible for land vehicles.  Will he succeed in surpassing himself or will he be consumed in his destructive quest?
title: 400 MPH
